name: angular-bootstrap-picker
description: a date picker for angularjs 1.5.x and bootstrap with working timezone handling, it uses moment moment-timezone and moment-range

scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run build-js
scripts.build-dev: echo "building final file for development" && browserify build/DatePicker.js > dist/DatePickerFinal.js && ncp src/css/DatePicker.css dist/DatePicker.css
scripts.build-js: echo "building final file" && npm run build-ts && npm run build-dev && npm run build-compress

author: Werner Punz
